EmailTemplate.name: HCF - Action Hub email INVITE to ALL 24/10/14
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Get your Action Hub Intro Ticket!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your NCS journey is over. REAL LIFE has begun.
BE THE CHANGE YOU WANT TO SEE IN THE WORLD!
and people will listen.
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a reminder that Action Hubs are ALMOST here! You are one click away. Check out what they are all about and get your ticket by clicking the link below.
ACTION HUB INFO & TICKETS
Rob The Challenge Society
robert.whiteside@the-challenge.org 07785 623 392 Facebook: www.facebook.com/tcs.westlondon Twitter: @challenge_HIHO Blog: http://hcfinspiringyouth-thechallenge.com/
